## EthersLiquity.stakeUniTokens() method

Stake Uniswap ETH/HCHF LP tokens to participate in liquidity mining and earn HLQT.

**Signature:**

```typescript
stakeUniTokens(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<void>;
```
